name: brave-real-puppeteer-playwright-core
description: 🦁 Brave Real-World Optimized Puppeteer & Playwright Core with 1-5ms ultra-fast timing, 50+ professional stealth features, intelligent browser auto-detection, and 100% bot detection bypass. Features cross-platform Brave browser integration, comprehensive anti-detection, and breakthrough performance improvements.

scripts.patch-puppeteer: node ./scripts/enhanced-patcher.js patch-comprehensive --packageName=puppeteer-core && npm run create-brave-puppeteer && npm run ai-agent
scripts.patch-playwright: node ./scripts/enhanced-patcher.js patch-comprehensive --packageName=playwright-core && npm run create-brave-playwright && npm run ai-agent
scripts.patch-both: npm run version-sync && npm run patch-puppeteer-basic && npm run patch-playwright-basic && npm run create-brave-packages && npm run ai-agent && npm run check-versions
scripts.setup-puppeteer: npm install puppeteer-core && npm run patch-puppeteer && npm run test-bot-detector-headless && echo 🎭 Puppeteer-core setup completed with EVERYTHING!
scripts.setup-playwright: npm install playwright-core && npm run patch-playwright && npm run test-bot-detector-headless && echo 🎪 Playwright-core setup completed with EVERYTHING!
scripts.setup-both: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run patch-both && npm run test-bot-detector-headless && echo 🎯 Both engines setup completed with ALL FEATURES!
scripts.setup-both-basic: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run patch-puppeteer-basic && npm run patch-playwright-basic && echo 🎯 Both engines setup completed with stealth only!
scripts.setup-complete: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run version-sync && npm run patch-both && npm run ai-agent && npm run test-bot-detector-headless && echo 🚀 Complete setup with stealth + AI + testing completed!
scripts.install-puppeteer: npm install puppeteer-core && npm run patch-puppeteer
scripts.install-playwright: npm install playwright-core && npm run patch-playwright
scripts.create-brave-packages: npm run version-sync && npm run create-brave-puppeteer && npm run create-brave-playwright
scripts.setup-ai-enhanced: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run patch-both && npm run create-brave-packages && npm run ai-agent && echo 🤖 AI-Enhanced setup with Brave packages completed!
scripts.setup-ultimate: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run patch-both && npm run test-bot-detector && npm run test-bot-detector-mobile && echo 🔥 Ultimate setup with all features completed!
scripts.help: echo 🎆 BRAVE STEALTH COMMANDS: && echo 🚀 Quick Setup: npm run setup-both && echo 🎨 Individual: npm run patch-puppeteer / patch-playwright && echo 🤖 AI Testing: npm run ai-agent && echo 🤾 Bot Testing: npm run test-bot-detector && echo 📊 Versions: npm run version-sync && echo 🔧 Fix Versions: npm run version-sync-fix
scripts.features: echo 🚫️ 50+ STEALTH FEATURES: Navigator, Canvas, WebGL, Performance, Human Behavior && echo 🤖 AI FEATURES: Intelligence Testing, Auto Analysis, Smart Cleanup && echo 🦁 BRAVE FEATURES: Auto-Detection, Optimized Launch, Privacy Protection
scripts.test-workflow: echo 🧪 WORKFLOW TEST INSTRUCTIONS: && echo === OPTION 1: Free Tier Workflow === && echo 1. Go to GitHub Actions tab && echo 2. Select 'Free Tier NPM Publish' && echo 3. Click 'Run workflow' && echo 4. Set test_mode: true && echo 5. Choose version_bump: brave-timestamp && echo 6. Click 'Run workflow' button && echo === OPTION 2: Full Auto Workflow === && echo 1. Select '🦁 Brave NPM Auto-Publish' && echo 2. Set test_mode: true && echo 3. Click 'Run workflow' && echo 🚀 Both will test complete publishing workflow!
